name: Eat_Da_Burger
description: Eat-Da-Burger! is a restaurant app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat.Whenever a user submits a burger's name, the app will display the burger on the left side of the page waiting to be devoured. Each burger in the waiting area also has a Devour it! button. When the user clicks it, the burger will move to the right side of the page. This app stores every burger in the database, whether devoured or not. ## Table of Contents
